website_summaries.verdict: Uses a food-grade orange oil, making it safe for all kinds of applications and uses.
pros: Reasonable price per ounce for orange oil
Uses ingredients that are biodegradable over the long run to make this an eco-friendly product
Works well for cleaning almost any kind of stains on any kind of surface
cons: Sometimes leaves a sticky residue on the surface of the item being cleaned

customer_reviews.title: Works great and smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This works great and it smells heavenly! I keep this mixed with vinegar in a spray bottle next to my kitchen counter. I use it to clean almost everything! I also use this in my natural weed-killer recipe. I mix about 1/4th cup of this with a little dawn dish soap and a gallon of horticultural vinegar (20%) in a sprayer. It kills weeds quickly on a hot sunny day! No more cancerous chemicals! This bottle lasts me about 6 months before it's time to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Headache, sensitivity to producy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I was interested in a non toxic way to deter ants in the house and I just got the package and prepared solution and something unexpected happened. My 9 year old started got an instant headache and we had to take her out of the house for air. She is sleeping on the couch in the living room room because I cleaned a bunch of rooms. The product is not defective. I think people assume that it is not as potent as other chemicals or that the orange wouldn't offend anyone. That is why I got it. Just beware that natural doesn't mean some people won't react.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bell

customer_reviews.title: No more cats around!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the orange oil to keep away stray cats from my patio. And dear people, it is working perfectly well, after a few days of spraying the walls and putting little containers with an ounce of the oil, the 10 cats that visited my patio every morning and afternoon, have gone down to tow. Great! Also use the oil for general household cleaning. Love it! Thank you EcoClean Solutions and thank you Amazon. Problem solved! Great scent! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Adria Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product!
customer_reviews.text: It has so many uses. We have used it with vinegar to kill weeds and it kills them after one application. I love the way the house smells when I add just a little to the laundry. It eliminates the cigarette smoke smell from my husbands clothes. Also, we use it diluted to clean the bathroom which gets the tub sparkling clean with no chemical smell! I will be buying more, because it's just that good.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best!
customer_reviews.text: This is a spectacular product! Expensive, but easily diluted and a great value. Safe to eat. Safe for pets! I use it for insect control, around the house and on exterior plants. I use it to control all insects in my garden and when I bring plants inside for the winter. I spray firewood initially to take care of termites as I stack wood inside a wooden cabin. I use it to clean counters, stove and bath area. It'll kill any insect with an exoskeleton... especially fire ants! I will NEVER be without it on my homestead! I guess it's a positive review! BIG thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: P. Sal

customer_reviews.title: I read good things about orange oil and pest control
customer_reviews.text: Very concentrated. I read good things about orange oil and pest control. This has proven that it is very effective on killing roaches. I am using it to attack termites but the results are a little harder to see. Will purchase again. Update: Awesome roach killer, its drops even the largest of roaches and we use it to clean the bathroom as well, it is good as a mildew remover and general cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: kenpo saber

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to spray for the tomcats having my front door be their urination station, but OMG this is seriously my new favorite thing. I bought one of those weed sprayers for better ease of use and ended up cleaning the counters, walls, windows, and looked outside to see THOUSANDS of dead ants. Im waiting to see if it’s killed any weeds. Best of all, it doesn’t smell like little boys in the house. It’s wonderful. I’m in love. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: I've been searching for a replacement to Orange-Glo cleaning oil ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a replacement to Orange-Glo cleaning oil. Finally found this item. It is very similar. My only negative comment is the bottle. It has a normal bottle opening size, so I often get too much on my rag. (Orange-Glo oil was in a squeeze bottle, so it was more controllable how much came out.) This product works very well at cleaning kitchen cabinets, hardwood floors, and wooden table. I use it primarily for cleaning wood.
customer_reviews.author: deadrock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent All Natural Weed Killer!
customer_reviews.text: Here's the recipe: 1 Gallon White Vinegar, 1 Cup Pure Cold Pressed Orange Oil, 2 teaspoons liquid dish soap (Dawn). Add all ingredients into a sprayer, and swish around to mix. Pump up the handle and let those nasty weeds have it! I picked a warm day with no rain in the forecast for rest of the week. In a few hours the leaves were flat and turning brown. Day two the weeds looked awful, and they were history by day three. The mixture smells more like oranges than vinegar and worked faster than those traditional toxic chemicals! Eventually I'll use it to clean my home and will definitely buy it again. 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: MS-C  Aurora, Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Kills Red Fire Ants Dead Safely, no danger to plants or pets or your self
customer_reviews.text: Organic gardening can be a challenge when your neighbors are using commercial lawn care products ... Fire Ants can be daunting as well... but we carry on...1 & 1/2 oz. of this orange oil plus 3 oz. Dawn liquid in 1 gal. H2O will end red fire Ants pretty dang quick. THANKS! LOVE YOUR PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID B DEAN

customer_reviews.title: This Orange Oil Concentrate smells exactly like a fresh cut orange
customer_reviews.text: I mixed some of this with water and it immediately dispersed into a diluted liquid. I had been using essential oils with peg-20 for insect control and cleaning, lots of measuring and shaking. The essential oils do not always stay in suspension. This is GREAT for me. I use it to clean and also repel some citrus tree bugs. I have actually 'lightly' sprayed this on a Myers Lemon tree while honey bees were all around the blossoms. All they did was move away from the spray. The aphids and white flies are now gone on that tree, bees are still there. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ken MTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: way better than any odor-removing sprays for cat pee
customer_reviews.text: have a cat that likes to spray on the curtains in one room... i mix a little in a pump-spray bottle and it removes the difficult, potent smell of cat urine. greatest stuff i ever found in regards to cleaning cat pee... also great to spray on furniture with a mist bottle just to make things smell nice.
customer_reviews.author: buyingsomuchfood

customer_reviews.title: One product with so many different uses!
customer_reviews.text: I originally wanted to buy this for aromatherapy but found out while I was reading reviews that it was good for cat urine, degreasing, in the garden which I wouldn't have thought of among other things and they're all true! I love this product! I rescue kitties. Just be careful with the smell around cats because they really don't like it and I wouldn't want to hurt their little noses but for the urine smell yes I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LADYKAT

customer_reviews.title: was not sticky and smelled better. We will try to find some uses for ...
customer_reviews.text: We have used orange oil on our floors for years, but never this brand. We diluted it with water per the instructions, but it left the floor sticky. We diluted it even more and it was still sticky. We used our old standby Medina orange oil and it cleaned up the mess, was not sticky and smelled better. We will try to find some uses for this product outside, but we will not buy any more.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: This stuff kills black widows
customer_reviews.text: My house is infested with black widows. In the same way that the wicked witch of the west melts on contact with water, spiders die when drenched with this stuff. I didn't believe it till I saw it myself, but it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Gibson

customer_reviews.title: A lot of hype.
customer_reviews.text: I primarily wanted this to keep my neighbors cat away from my 10x8 area of dirt. The scent was strong, but pleasant. The very following day, my neighbors cat walked into the middle and left a massive pile of poop. All was not lost, as I decided to try and use this as an insect repellent. No luck. It does indeed kill ants and a few other insects on contact, but about an half hour later the bugs returned.
customer_reviews.author: ClaytonTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile Product!
customer_reviews.text: My research had shown that this product was quite versatile, good for a number of uses. My main desire was to come up with an alternative way of killing fire ants, so I tried it on a large fire ant hill. The results were quite impressive, as the orange oil mixture ( orange oil, dish soap, water) took out the ants with a single treatment As a result, we are trying it out on a much larger fire ant hill to see what happens. I found that in the case of orange oil, a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: George Bednar

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after leaning from an online article put out by Texas A&M that D-Limonene was a great organic ingredient to assist in the killing of south Florida fire ants. I had been struggling to rid these nasty creature from my yard after my small dog went into anaphylaxis after running through a pile of fire ants. After I applied the first treatment to the fire ant pile, they were gone. And as new pile came, I again treated the pile. It has now been about one month and i have the problem totally under control. Thank you so much for this amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.author: sjr

customer_reviews.title: My Wife's New Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: I scored 100 points getting this for my wife lol. She went on a cleaning rampage with it. I'm serious. She spent a day cleaning the bathroom, kitchen, sprayed furniture where the cat was scratching it, wiped black mold of the window sills and on and on. She's tried them all and says this is the best cleaning product on Earth. I'm looking forward to trying in the spring on the weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Dentist The Mentist

customer_reviews.title: and I have to say it’s done a great job. No issues with raccoons
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to repel predators from around my chicken coop in the backyard, and I have to say it’s done a great job. No issues with raccoons, possums, stray cats, or other pests. Interestingly enough, it repels insects and flies as well. The best part is that chickens don’t smell very well (if at all) so they are not bothered by the very strong orange scent! I love the smell and have been using it to clean as well. Very cool product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chambers

customer_reviews.title: will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: keeps away feral cats from my yard - will purchase another bottle as soon as i finish this one
customer_reviews.author: lois g. mouriski

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells bad. Not like oranges, or the wonderful smell of other orange oils I have purchased. Wonder if the 'emulsifier' noted as the 2nd ingredient interacted badly. Anyway...Ick.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth S Foster

customer_reviews.title: Works on mealybugs infesting hibiscus
customer_reviews.text: Noticed mealybugs infesting my hibiscus plant. Tons of them. Mixed a few ounces of this into a one-gallon pump sprayer and applied liberally to the plant. It has knocked the bugs back quite effectively, and doesn't appear to have harmed the plant at all. It looks like repeated applications will be required in order to fully eradicate them. I like the fact that it's a natural product and doesn't contain man-made pesticides.
customer_reviews.author: Elemeno

customer_reviews.title: Great product..great scent
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this a couple years ago after we bought a home on 3.5 acres, but with a galley like, small back yard. Our dogs had very little room to do their business and even though we stopped daily, we still battled the odor. I was originally intent on buying another product, but it was out of stock, so I got this and loved it. The odor, according to my hubs, can be a little overpowering, but it is a scent I love. I not only use this outside, but also to mop my wood floors and clean wood furniture. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Burke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product for everything!!! Haven't used it for termites yet but it's wonderful for cleaning! I mop my floors with it, I suspect that's why I haven't had any ants this year! First time in 24 years!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. kidd

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cats out of yard (for a while)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to deter neighbor's 50 cats from coming into my yard. . . it works and smells good, but you will definitely need to use fairy frequently if you want it to remain effective. I sprayed about a 1:30 ratio and the cats were back in about a week. Might last longer depending on ratio.
customer_reviews.author: jmt

customer_reviews.title: KILLS FIREANTS DEAD!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for reminding me! I need to order more of this! Want to take care of the fire ants around here BEFORE spring! (Add 2 oz Orange Oil, 1 tsp dish liquid soap, 1 TBL black strap molasses, mix well with 1 gallon water) Pour center of ant bed, and around perimeter. Watch them pile up, instantly. Thank you for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paula L.

customer_reviews.title: Orange oil is my new cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Matt, I am so happy with this orange oil, the clean fresh fragrance keeps my house and laundry smelling nice. Cleaning with this product helps remove dirt and grime. I use this Orange oil in my dishwater, laundry, mop pile. I add it to a spray bottle and uses it on my plants to keep bugs away. I had small black flying bugs on my house plants and took a chance by diluting the orange oil in water and putting it in a spray bottle and to my surprise, all the bugs died. besides cleaning the house and killing bugs, I'm still looking to find more uses for this great orange oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on killing fire ants naturally and quickly at less than 1%
customer_reviews.text: I have used chemicals like (Spectracide for Fire Ants ) to get rid of fire ants before, but this year, the rain was enough to drive them to massive numbers on our yard. Instead, I checked out some Youtube videos using it at less than 1% strength with 2% Garret Juice to help reduce damage to plants, all diluted in water. I wiped out 10 mounds of varying sizes that appeared within a 48 hour period. It was amazing! It's been 4 days now with no sign of return visitors anywhere on my 1/4 acre lot. I don't know what neighbors are facing though. Keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be just another cleaning product. However, it cut through grime faster, and more completely than everything we had been using. I thought Simple Green was a good cleaner before I tried this and so did my family. Once we used this product, I was being asked to leave it so a newly acquired house that had been badly neglected could be cleaned. Pure Cold Pressed Orange Oil Concentrate smells great and does not leave a film that then has to be cleaned. We are very pleased and plan to get more as it is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Ellefson

customer_reviews.title: 2017 -- different formulation. Smells terrible, solution much darker. No fresh orange smell
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product when it first came out several years ago -- changed formula. No longer smells like fresh tangerines/oranges. Weird chemical smell, solution much darker. Wish I didn't stock up and get two bottles. Both smelled awful and too late to return. Will try CitriSolv.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: My Cats HATE It!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the orange oil to keep my two cats off my new area rug. When I misted it with the spray Princess immediately took off and The Baby was looking down from her perch on the kitty condo like "hell no". Need to reapply every few days but I just mist the carpet every night. This morning I saw claw marks so I upped the misting a little. Don't want to cause them distress, just want my rug to stay beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning but not cats
customer_reviews.text: I gave this an overall rating of 3 because I bought it specifically to keep cats out of the garden. while it has a pleasant scent and is a good cleaner, it di not keep the cats from getting in the garden or using it as a litter box! I think the cats around here thought it was a spa addition. The product did say it could be used as a deterrent for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Babette Hiles

customer_reviews.title: mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 3 stars because it didn't do what I boyght it for... could be just the fact I have mutant fire ants... who knows But this stuff smells divine and it does work as a cleaner... Off to buy gas to light the yard on fore since that seems to be the only way to get rid of the mutant ants I have UPDATE Went back out and stirred up the new mounds... there are only about 40 live ants in one satellite and no live ones in the other three... still watching and if they go away for good will update to a 5
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have found many uses for this, but my favorite is general cleaning. I love the smell and it lasts! I have used it as a degreaser, plant spray, and plan to add it to my pet shampoo for extra cleaning and flea repelling. Just love the stuff!
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great product I used about 2 oz in a 24 oz spray bottle filled the rest with water so far I used it to clean stove hood and kitchen cabinets it worked wonderfully sprayed let it set for a minute then sprayed some dollar store all purpose cleaner which I probably didn’t need because the stuck on grease wiped right off. I won’t be buying all those various cleaners anymore the smell is great a little bit of it goes a long way and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Britt/Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Smells great! Regarding the reviewer who said it smelled like ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Regarding the reviewer who said it smelled like fish... I also thought it did when I first opened the bottle. But this stuff is super concentrated and is very strong if you're sniffing it right out the bottle. When diluted properly however, it smells just like fresh oranges. I use it in the bathroom, on the counter tops and on the floors. Has been great so far and will last a long time! If someone is coming over I do a quick wipe down of my hard surfaces and it makes the whole house smell great.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Troy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't deter my stubborn cat.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in the hopes it would deter my cat from urinating on our new throw rugs. No medical issue, she's just determined to ruin most things we buy in our quest to finally adult our home now that the kids are older. It does smell very good. I haven't used it for cleaning, but I suppose I'll give it a shot now that I know I don't need to save it to spray down our rugs!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I’m doing it right
customer_reviews.text: I used the Orange Oil to get rid of ants in my garden beds and I sprayed directly on them and they just kept on walking around. I mixed 3 oz per gallon so I’m going to keep on trying and making the mix stronger. 😳
customer_reviews.author: Snookie

customer_reviews.title: A great and safe cleaner to use around the house and the garden.
customer_reviews.text: I love Orange Oil Concentrate to clean around my home. We use it to clean wood furniture and in the kitchen. I love how well it performs at cutting grease. You can't beat the smell of it and using a natural product is very important for us. The other reason I use this product is to repel ladybugs. We have an infestation each fall and ladybugs can't stand the smell of orange oil. It's a safe way to repel the bugs and not harm such a beneficial insect. My shopping experience was fast and easy and I will be ordering again soon. My friends have been very impressed with the many uses your Orange Oil Concentrate has. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy natural orange scent & multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three times in the past year and highly recommended to my sister. Great product because I enjoy the fresh natural orange scent & you can dilute as needed it to address different needs. I use it daily to wipe down my kitchen and bathroom counters. I’ve used a dap or two concentrated to clean spots. And, I’ve used it about 1 to 1 with water to spray porch area where stray cats gathered. After several days of daily spraying the cats were gone. Have to periodically refresh so they will stay away. I do think they should make a larger size and price could better or they should offer a multi purchase discount like “buy one get one 50%”.
customer_reviews.author: Gam

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Really works well, on everything!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best cleaning product I've ever used! It cuts through dirt and grease with very little effort, and works where other products failed. I waited to buy this until I used up many other cleaning products. Had I known this worked better (and smells delicious!) I would have thrown away the others and bought this A lot sooner. I really like the lingering orange scent, and it doesn't affect my asthma. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mary s.

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation
customer_reviews.text: I got this because of all the great reviews. Some even stated it was edible. Please read the label. It sounds very toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this to deter cats from my property. It seems to be working well. They have quit crapping the section of my yard they were using as a litter box. I've been spraying around my vehicles and house. I really like the smell of it, so that's a nice bonus. The only downside is that you must spray ever few days, depending on whether it has rained or not. I have not tried using it for other purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Drac1026

customer_reviews.title: sellar, good product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cleaning and it leaves a nice scent behind without smelling like a toxic cleaner. I am a bird rehabilitator and this product works for both the clean smell left over in my hawk chamber hallway and to clean off my bird of prey perches, etc. I also use it to help control ants as we get fire ants from time to time. Unlike us, they don't like the scent. lol! The product came quickly, was packaged nicely and I didn't have to go out in this summer desert heat to buy it in town. Thank you! Lisa
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Using this product for ant control!
customer_reviews.text: This oil seems to work as well as anything else and is less toxic than OTC poisons. It is a higher concentrate than other orange oil products but is still rather expensive to use as a drench. I'd greatly appreciate an option of buying a 4 pack at an even better price per ounce. BTW, the price per ounce on the 2-pack is incorrect, it is .63 per ounce on two 32 ounce bottles.
customer_reviews.author: JBaker

customer_reviews.title: Great natural, food grade cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great natural product that smells great. I have been using it for various cleaning or even just as a deodorizer in a very weak dilution. I love how strong this oil scent is. It has plant based surfactant which allows you to make any mixture with just water if you wished.
customer_reviews.author: Boomhauer

customer_reviews.title: Useless to keep cats. Away
customer_reviews.text: Very over priced and if u get it to keep cats away do not waste your money doesn’t work, Emailed the company and. The representative was a useless jerk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Further testing a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for a safe weed killer that isn't toxic to people and the planet as well as to plants. I'm giving it a huge test right now -- trying to wipe out oleander plants! It worked beautifully for the other things I used it on though, and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Twiga

customer_reviews.title: The most useful household product I have
customer_reviews.text: Mixed with vinegar, it's a phenomenal weed killer; diluted, it cleaned my entire car (which now smells like an orange grove); I've used it to clean just about everything. Smells fine if you like citrus smells, not too overpowering. Handle with care, it's highly concentrated.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenA

customer_reviews.title: Bottle had no cap on it, how does THAT happen?
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this oil in a few diy projects, and you'd think getting a bottle of orange oil would be something that nothing could go wrong. However, that want the case here. My bottle thankfully has a foil seal because it was delivered with no cap. So when I open this bottle there is no way to cap it off.
customer_reviews.author: Gwenn McN

customer_reviews.title: Great for weeds and cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I bought this for a healthier version for weed control. It worked really well when adding it with vinegar and salt. It also made my yard smell really great for over a week! I have a dog run that is all rocks and it really helps with the smell there too. I also have been using it for cleaning and the house smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: 🌿 Fern 🌿

customer_reviews.title: Works Really Well
customer_reviews.text: I've used this orange oil concentrate mixed with regular distilled vinegar to deep clean and disinfect my chicken coop. Leave the coop looking great and smelling great. I've also used the orange oil concentrate with 20% distilled vinegar to use as a natural weedkiller. Boy, I was amazed by how quickly and thoroughly the weeds were knocked back. I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LauraM

customer_reviews.title: It worked, killed the termites.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to rid of swarming termites. It worked. We had to wipe walls where they entered into our bed room, though not too large an area. The smell of oil was very strong but expected it would be, knowing it is not harmful to us it was endurable.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great in households with lots of pets!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and buy it every month or so and love the smell. We have lots of pets both dogs and cats and this keeps everything smelling nice and fresh. We even use a little in the washing machine to freshen and clean pet bedding. I use it on the deck to clean and it seems to repel those pesky spiders off the porch as well. Will be buying this stuff every month or so for cleaning for sure. Found this late in the garden season but will also give the bug repellant mix a try in the spring!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Eliza

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff. We bought it to help with keeping g carpenter ants at bay and it works. Now I use it around the perimeter of our house to keep bugs out. I also use it to clean the entire house. I refuse to use toxins to clean and Pure Cold Pressed Orange Oil has been great.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Used for fire ants with what seems to be success
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work on ants. Works faster if a few oz of soap is added per gallon of water. Works even faster with 2-3 oz of orange oil per gallon of water. Final outcome largely depends on how how ant colony is structured though. Even if you pour 5 gallons of solution in, it may not get everywhere into the colony. So check surrounding the next day for small satellites.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: After a half of century of Pine Sol, I love the Florida smell VS the Michigan smell. This product has so many uses, I'm trying to avoid using it as a cologne. No pets, but I have a beige carpet with an asphalt parking lot. Works great with a pleasing odor left behind. After the initial sticker shock, as a concentrated product it should last a couple or more years. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Big O'Dude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smell, potent cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for one reason and now using for another. I use essential oils for many uses. This is an orange oil product and I love it’s power with gentleness for cleaning almost any surface. It’s also wonderful for hardwood floors and tile. It’s a portent cleaner with an awesome smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: scent less than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I use this combined with 30% vinegar for weed killer and ant deterrent. I like my last brand better because it smelled stronger. I don't know if this works as well. I always have mixed results with these treatments. If it had been cheaper I would have given a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: B. R.

customer_reviews.title: total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: read all these reviews and guarantees of how it keeps cats from remarking - NOT TRUE. And for the absorbedent cost it makes the disappointment even stronger. WILL NEVER BUY AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: HMA

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work to keep cats off furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Smells good but didn’t work to keep cats away. We sprayed it twice just as instructed. Cats were not the least bit bothered by it. The 2nd fine we spayed it 3X recommended strength trying to make it super strong. Cats still came right on over the fence and to the patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: sallysunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great product and smells good too!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fresh smell of this product. I use it combined with the 30% vinegar to clean my floors. Together these two products easily tackle some difficult dried stuff (like dog drool) on my floors. (I have two mammoth sized dogs in my home.) This is also a great product for cleaning bathrooms. Look forward to combining it with the vinegar to tackle some stubborn weeds in spring. There is no chemical smell to this product, but rather a pleasant, yet mild, orange scent. Wish I'd found this sooner. Will definitely be reordering when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses and smell great
customer_reviews.text: Order was delivered on time. We love it. We use it as safe indoor insect killer since we have young children in the home and wanted something safe without poisonous chemicals. We have also been using it as a cleaning product - cleaning our dining room table. Best of all its natural and safe. My wife had an old diffuser that we use the oil in and it makes the house smell great! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: V. Kha

customer_reviews.title: Good product, many uses
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for various things. I sprayed around the outside of my house to keep stray cats away and it worked. I also use it to clean around the house and it does a great job, especially on those grease stains on the stove. I've also used it as a bug spray which works and has a great smell to it. A little of this goes a long way. I've done all this and not even 1/4 in to the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Macias

customer_reviews.title: great natural cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, I use it to clean pretty much everything. It leaves a super fresh citrus scent and destroys grease on kitchen cabinets, etc. I find it good on the wood cabinets and floors as it won't dry the wood out either.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this stuff at work. It has a great long lasting natural orange scent and cleans up the floor, counters and sinks really nice. We dont usebit as the main cleaner as we try to make a little go along way, but using just a little to freshen up the restrooms or cottages is great.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product with Many Uses!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this particular orange oil. It is worth every penny. I use it everywhere, from my laundry to my garden. Even use it as an air freshener. It's concentrated, and I get several gallons out of a bottle, depending on how I'm using it at the time. Definitely a repeat purchase. Please don't ever change your formula.
customer_reviews.author: Random Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent multi purpose product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Cleans really well, amazing scent, all natural and multi purpose. I like to also spray a fine mist of a bit of oil mixed with purified water into the air as an air freshener. I’ll be back for more. I think this bottle will last a very long time and I am constantly cleaning up after pets. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: JCandThePussycats

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works!
customer_reviews.text: I read that the orange oil would help with indoor termites which I sprayed my cabinet and then wiped. I didn’t want to stain the cabinet with the oil so I just wiped it. Left a placent smell and I have not seen any since. I also read that is a good cleaner which I’m going to try. Thank you for a good product which are hard to find. I definitely will recommend your product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great; Smells even better!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! As I move away from cleaning chemicals this is now my favorite household thing. A little goes a very long way. I add just a tad to a mixture of water, baking soda and vinegar to clean floors, counters and appliances in my kitchen and bathrooms. Stubborn stains go away quickly and leave no residue -- even on stainless steel. All come out sparkly clean and my house smells like freshly peeled oranges. You'll love!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fragrance/Super Cleaning!!
customer_reviews.text: This has a delightful fragrance and cleans so well. I mixed a TBS. with water and put in a 32oz. spray bottle. Great for cleaning the kitchen sink, counters, etc. At night, I pour a tiny bit mixed with water down each of the drains. Next morning, the drains smell so fresh. Can't wait to try it when scrubbing the commodes. Thanks for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: joeln

customer_reviews.title: I got it yesterday and pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned a dirty oven, wiped everything down, added a drop to my steam mop, wiped bathroom floor, cleaned dining bench seat fabric, and like it. The orange scent doesn't last a while day. I use a diffuser for that, but I have no idea how anyone can be overcome by the scent. This dissipated in an hour or 2.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 😁
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Using to keep feral cats away. I put it in a spray bottle with some dawn and soak all my outdoor wood surfaces (fence, patio, woodchip/rockbed) once a week. It also cleans sticky stuff amazing. I just wish it wasn't so expensive. I know it's concentrate so you dilute it but I still go through a quite a bit of it this way.
customer_reviews.author: C Mary

customer_reviews.title: Smell amazing, great product and natural!!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont usually write review but this one I could not resist. This orange oil smells amazing and its safe to use for cleaning almost everything. I mix 50% water and 50% vinegar and 2 caps of this orange oil for cleaning the whole house. Omg, my house had never been smelling this amazing NATURALLY!!! Yes, its pricey but worth every penny knowing its safe for home, pets and the environment. I whole hearty recommend this product. Please manufacture donot change anything on this product. Quality comes with price. Im willing to pay for it to get a great outcome. Thank you for making it!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Kills my invasive zoysia grass in minutes!
customer_reviews.text: A "friend" planted some zoysia in my yard -- with friends like those, who need enemies, right? -- and it decided it was in heaven. I have been trying to slow the invasion ...and this is the first thing that even looks like it might work. And it's a semi-organic approach. Thank you for making this precious stuff accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Potts

customer_reviews.title: Makes my house smell amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to clean an embarrassingly dirty sink and bathtub. Poured it on, undiluted, let it sit for a while then just rinsed clean! There were a couple spots I needed to scrub/wipe down but this seriously did most of the work.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Jenae

customer_reviews.title: Great for making your own products
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. I have been a housekeeper for many years, and because of the plastic waste by my current company, I decided to make my own products. One capful with some vinegar & water—you now have the best cleaning solution available. Tried and tested against many other name brand products, including Meyers & Seventh generation. This will save you some serious dollars in the long run. You’re welcome :)
customer_reviews.author: freelvn

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this to spray around my yard for the purpose of repelling stray cats. The cats were coming up on my deck and spraying everything, including a brand new deck box. I used it to clean the cat urine off the deck box and it did a great job cleaning and getting rid of the smell. Kept the cats away for a night or 2, but I will need to spray it around the deck again. Regardless, I love the smell of oranges and this smells great! No bad chemical smell. Follow the instructions on the bottle, this stuff is strong.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: It is working.
customer_reviews.text: I mixed 2 tbs with a gallon of water and poured it slowly into a hill of fire ants. I recently moved to Florida, and found out about fire ants. Where exactly in Florida is that crack in the ceiling of Hell where those little bastards are crawling out of?!!? My whole yard was moving, and it was alive with those crawling demons. I looked at poison, but have pets and grandkids, and like the lizards and frogs, and wanted something I could be a little selective with, and chose to use orange oil. It seems to be working. Every day I am treating a few more ant hills, and I am seeing a reduction in their numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Many uses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought to repel cats from my car. Doesn't really work for that with feral cats. It does have many many other uses so still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Kills termites
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to kill termites. It works wonders! Woke up to a termite infestation in my bathroom, used this to eradicate them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great for killing ants, cleaning, freshening air, etc...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product! It can be used for so many things. It makes a great cleaner and degreaser. Safe to use around food. Very effective even when diluted with water for cleaning and a wonderful side effect is that it is very, very effective on ants. Love how they stop moving so quickly and it leaves this wonderful orange aroma in the air!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Godd product smells good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product to kill fire ants in my yard😲. I poured about half on them directly without diluting. It didn't kill them all. I'm going to keep the other half of the bottle for cleaning purposes and other things. I love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stuff I would buy it again cleans everything
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for cleaning also one spell paint I was looking at a can of paint see if it was flat or semi gloss and I was looking at it on my moms porch and the lid wasn’t on tight and spilled everywhere I ran to my house get this stuff and clean it right up thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: sher

customer_reviews.title: Cleans everything
customer_reviews.text: I've used the product to clean nearly every surface in my house, and it has worked great and been safe for all surfaces. It cleans as well as any cleaner I've ever used. I bought this because I read that it might help prevent my cat from 'spraying' or 'marking' in my house, and it has really worked. I couldn't be more pleased. I also spray it on and around my front door and the neighborhood cats don't come around my house anymore. It's amazing. This Citrus Oil is a great product. I've already recommend it to several people I know. Buy this with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scent and very potent
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! It smells great even my cats seem to like it. It definitely drives roaches away every time I applied it they totally disappeared until the scent faded which lasts almost all day. It is also so potent that it should last me for months making it a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Parkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Orange Oil - Great for a lot of uses
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this product to treat a few spots around my home where there's evidence of termites. I haven't actually used it for that yet, but have found that it's been a great rodent deterrent in the garage. I've been using peppermint oil there, which is great, but dissipates within a week and I have to reapply. Since I read that rodents don't like things like peppermint because it masks the scent of their predators, I decided to try the orange oil. It soaks into the wood, is a nice change from the mint, and seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: LW from LA

customer_reviews.title: Orange Oil does it all.
customer_reviews.text: Price is great, I have paid much more in the past. It can be inserted into your walls if you have termites, kills them. Diluted makes a great cleaner, will get sticky tree sap off my lopper...all around great product to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: I will never live without it anymore!!! AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to clean the hood and the filters on top of the stove. Magically all the cooking grease went away effortlessly. I love the smell of oranges that it leaves behind. I added to the dish soap as natural perfume and to increase the product degreasing ability. I am enjoying reading the different customer reviews and get ideas for different uses. Initially, I discovered it while looking for a natural solution to termites.
customer_reviews.author: Eleonora Fusco

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help to fend off the cats
customer_reviews.text: Am spraying this product around the outside of my house (around the foundation, front door mat) to try to keep the roving cats at bay -- it seems to help quite a bit but I do need to go around roughly once a week to refresh it up in order to maintain the effect. This is the only thing I've found so far that actually helps!
customer_reviews.author: StephPA

customer_reviews.title: Weed Killer
customer_reviews.text: I used this in conjunction with 30% strength cleaning vinegar, some table salt, and liquid soap. This combination incinerated the weeds in our gravel - I saw the results within an hour and by the next day, the weeds looked like they had been dead for weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Broomielder

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My house is infected with fleas and ants lately, so my friend told me to buy orange oil. Check on Amazon and found this product. I mixed it with water to sweep the floor in hope fleas and ants will go away. Surprisingly, fleas are decreased each time I do, ants are disappeared, and my house is full of fresh orange scent. I also mixed it in a bottle to clean the countertop, tables, kitchen, basically everything; it removes dirt and oil very good. I love it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Great smell cleans nicely!
customer_reviews.text: This orange oil smells wonderful! I use it for mopping tile and hardwood floor , cleaning counter tops and spraying the out side of our house to protect against termites and bugs. (Spiders) Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mama of 2!

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: I started purchasing the orange oil to help control the fire ants in my yard and garden areas. It takes at least 2 applications to work on most of the mounds treated. Now, I am starting to used for so much more. A tiny amount on the vacuum cleaner filter makes the house smell wonderful. Spraying around the edge of the porch helps keep snakes from crawling under the porch. Putting a bit on a soft rag and wiping the interior of the car gets rid of unpleasant doggie or fast food odors. So many more uses without all the heavy chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and great price
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever! This is my second review, first one was declined despite my love for product. I love the stuff great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: lemony snickett

customer_reviews.title: It all depends upon what you might use it for.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what you mean by 'presentation' in your star rating? But overall, A week four for me. I thought it was organic, but it was not. My fault. Mis ordered, sort of..
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Best degreaser ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy a similar product in the 90's for those tough jobs. I recently had to clean out a "lazy susan" with years of dried and sticky grease . I tried every cleaner available shelves and nothing worked! I remembered the orange oil I used to use and went to Amazon to look for it. I found this product was the best price for the $$. I worked amazing and the surface has been restored and back to clean and white! oh, and a side bonus... it can be used to killed fire ants!! I would recommend this to anyone and I would purchase this again. satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I bought it because my male cats have been spraying. It works great! I add it with white vinegar to the areas needed. Takes away the smell. I highly recommend it. I will be buying again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: can be purchased over the internet
customer_reviews.text: It has a pleasing odor and is strong as a cleaner I purchased it to use as a means to eliminate a seasonal millipede problem here in Florida, these creatures show up at this time of the year so I thought I would try to spray around house. This did not work and had no effect on them what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: molly6

product_meta.title: Cold Pressed Orange Oil Concentrate - 32 oz (D-Limonene) by Green Gobbler
feature_bullets: POWERFUL HOME CLEANER AND DEGREASER. Green Gobbler Cold-Pressed Orange Oil is a practically perfect all-purpose cleaner! Our orange oil contains 80-95% D-Limonene, a naturally occurring and non-toxic solvent and degreaser with thousands of practical uses. Also contains a non-ionic coconut surfactant to make miscible.
THOUSANDS OF PRACTICAL USES. Orange oil is an extremely versatile & powerful natural solvent. Use Orange oil to remove dirt, grease, oil, food, odors, ink, glue, crayon, soap scum, etc.

COLD-PRESSED TO PRESERVE INTEGRITY. Heat is not used during the extraction process for the D-Limonene present in Green Gobbler Cold-Pressed Orange Oil. The cold-pressed technique preserves the degreasing qualities of the orange oil and ensures you are receiving a powerful, natural product.

SAFE TO USE ON NEARLY ANY SURFACE. Use on practically any surface to remove stains and soils. Use Orange Oil to clean metal, glass, granite, porcelain, tile, brick, concrete, stucco, rubber, plastic, and more.
WONDERFULLY REFRESHING SCENT. Chemicals like bleach and ammonia can give off toxic fumes. With Green Gobbler Cold-Pressed Orange, you’ll only smell citrus after cleaning.
